storyInfo:
FrostNova, who was rescued first, did not kill the Doctor, hoping that the two sides would never cross paths again.
However, reality can be cruel and unforgiving.

attributes.content: (Blaze. I need you to lead the team to seize the advantage.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (You want to organize a raid?)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (I'm very worried about our current situation.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Both we and the Yetis have used our respective skills to locate the Doctor and FrostNova. Thanks to your Arts, they are now safe.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (And... The two are very close. If you can save one, you can save the other.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (There are two things we can't be sure of right now.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (First, who will reach them first...?)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Second, FrostNova's attitude.)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (Exactly.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (If we get the initiative, we'll have to subdue FrostNova immediately. But we also have to trade her for Yeti Squad's cooperation.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (That way, we avoid fighting, and also deepen the opportunity for communication.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (But if they get there first...)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Um, Amiya, the heartbeat detector found something. We have a position, but we don't know the depth...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Right!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hey... Wait!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Where's the fire? Aww.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: As soon as the Doctor comes up, she gets all panicky and forgets herself.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: I'm not sure if this is a bug in Amiya or a feature...
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: You know, the stuff she just said, that's not like her at all. She came up with it too fast.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: At least she didn't come around to a sneak attack. This one's on us.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Not quite. If we ambushed them, the Yetis would just fight to the death.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm here to rescue you all, not cause more casualties. She didn't give up on her winning outcome.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...I guess I should apologize. It's the mercenary in me.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: You didn't do it, did you?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Keeping a level head after her victories and keeping to her tactical goals are what makes me trust Amiya as field commander.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm gonna go check on the Yetis.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: This structure... It's so complicated. It makes my head hurt.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: Describe it to me and I'll draw it up.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Huh? I didn't even finish my eighth grade textbook in middle school. Give me a break.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: What did you do instead of class again?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: I went to train.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: Why not let Nesti try? He's got some Arts, doesn't he?
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: He's all about reciting poetry and writing essays. That's not your structural probing business.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Well, why not try to express it through numbers?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Good idea. I'm okay at math. Let's try it.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: Does it feel hot to you?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: No. I'm wearing this thick heavy thing and even so I still feel Sister's Originium freezing my skin off...
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: Hi, Rhodes Island cat.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: Sorry, but when I sweat, the air around me heats up, and then I just keep sweating.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Thanks to you guys, I'm feeling a lot cooler than usual.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Are you nervous?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: A little. I never thought I'd be working with the enemy.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: For now, at least, we aren't enemies. After digging out our Sister, we'll do what she says. But we'll cross that bridge when we come to it.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: ...You guys really aren't anything like the other Reunion folks.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You think the rest of Reunion is all the same? Are you and the bunny the same?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Hey, yeah. Good point. We've got all kinds on our side.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Everyone's got all kinds.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: At least you're willing to listen to us. The Ursus soldiers all just shoot us on sight.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: The arrows start flying and they don't stop until one side is dead.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: Good thing we're a pharmaceutical company and not a bunch of Ursus soldiers.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Do pharmaceutical companies all have equipment like yours?
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: The world is a dangerous place and we have to protect ourselves, right?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It would be nice if you spent your time farming instead of battling.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: If you can grow a harvest of red wheat, you'll feed half a town's starving Infected.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: If they weren't starving, they wouldn't have gone into that little town. Then they wouldn't have been shot.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: If only.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: Enough of that.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: He's pretty sentimental. You know, I think all Ursus are pretty sentimental.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: No slacking off!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: Oops, sorry. Time to get back to work.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: No big deal. Go back to your work.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But that thing you're carrying, it's got a powerful smell.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh? This...? I...
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: What's she talking about?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: Nothing. Don't worry.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey, a mite peckish.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What are you looking at me for?
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: Ruins of Chernobog 'District 14'
Sector Surface
3 hours into the excavation operation
Amiya, stop!
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Your fingers are bleeding! Stop digging with your hands!
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: But... I can feel something down there... Right down here!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can't feel it if I'm using a tool... I have to use my fingers to pick up on that tiny whisper of a feeling...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya!
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: It's close!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Meteorite...)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (Leave her be.)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: If we let them get there first...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's okay, you can do it!
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: Use Arts! I- I can't. I really can't!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member D

attributes.content: We can do this even without our Sister, right? Hurry up and make the temperatures nice and different. The bigger the difference, the better!
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: I'll try... But don't blame me if it doesn't work!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member D

attributes.content: Who else can we blame besides you...?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Don't tease him. He has to concentrate.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: Here! Right here!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...A wall? Did I get it wrong?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Just smash it! Break through...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But if it collapses, I...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I... got it wrong.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's open!
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: Blaze! Meteorite!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: On it.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Get ready.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Said I won't lose.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: You didn't give me a winning choice.

attributes.content: Sister!
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: This is the one they call the Doctor.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.options: So am I being shot or hanged?;......!;Hi.

attributes.content: The leader of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: That's me. You can call me Amiya.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Her rings... are turning red?)
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: (Aren't you going to stop her?)
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: (Why would I stop our only chance at winning?)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze!
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: I respect Amiya's decision.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Nesti, is Rhodes Island not fighting you?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: They're not.
attributes.name: Nesti

attributes.content: Then here on this battlefield, we are not enemies.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: FrostNova...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There is no reason to fight if we are not enemies.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Go back, Doctor, to your people.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...Our Sister is so magnanimous.
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: Like she needs your approval.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Quiet down.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Little rabbit.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Uh, my name is Amiya...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're going to Lungmen too, aren't you?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...That's right.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then we will be enemies before long, little rabbit. Just, not yet.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: FrostNova, you and your team aren't as destructive as the other Reunion units.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't blame my people. You don't know what they've been through.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But you don't want them to go on like this!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It seems you can read my mind?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I can't. But I do sense your unease and your consternation.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All of this will be swept away after the fall of Lungmen.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Rhodes Island, we can honestly understand you and your squad.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You may think I'm wrong, and that we don't understand you at all...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But FrostNova, ma'am, I know exactly what you've been through.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ......Childish.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: FrostNova, those clothes aren't yours, are they?

attributes.content: They're not. This was once the cloak of the 'Patriot.' I wove it into a coat.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: How can you tell?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Never mind...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Everyone has some things they can't say, I suppose.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: FrostNova, Rhodes Island does not seek out conflict. We want to avoid unnecessary bloodshed.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And which bloodshed was necessary?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: At the very least, we don't want to fight your squad!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They are all good, decent people. We absolutely cannot hurt them, or let them hurt innocent people!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Then you must pray we do not meet again.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: FrostNova!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I think I don't much want to hurt you either. But if I have to, I will kill you all.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: You can come to Rhodes Island. We don't have to fight.

attributes.content: Then you can try to beat me.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Defeat me in battle, and I will consider it.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But of course, once we meet on the battlefield, we are enemies. And as enemies, we will fight to the death.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Oh yes. This one, for the fox.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: A special remedy for frostbite. One-of-a-kind recipe. It relieves the burning and pain.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I've studied these things for a long time. And you fought very well back there.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Warriors willing to sacrifice themselves are the strongest, in my eyes.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: FrostNova...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hey, wait. I have something to say too.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Yeti #1!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh... huh?
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: What's happening?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Let's get a drink next time! Your vodka smells great!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Don't say that out loud!
attributes.name: Yeti #1

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Goodbye, Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I hope we never meet again.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Lungmen Substructure
Here you are, after all.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hello, Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: FrostNova
